pages.text: $(thing)Mod packs$() are collections of $(thing)Mods$() that have been put together and configured so that they all work together. $(br2)These packs are often centered around a general theme like tech, quests, or magic.

$(br)$(thing)Mod packs$() often have either custom launchers or installers that make installing and running the pack easy. $(br)$(li)You can find mods $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/modpacks)here$()
